description: Get after it in the Men's Mitre Peak Pant—a solid alpine performer that's got you covered from pre-dawn starts to sunset at the trailhead. A combo of durable GORE-TEX 3L and lightweight GORE-TEX Active, these hiking pants keep it light for efficient moving in the mountains. The ankle zippers and elastic waist belt helps dial in your fit, and zippered pockets make it easy to stash small gear.
name: Marmot Mitre Peak GTX Pants, Reg - Mens
